item.title: Some function words need reading weakly
item.description: Reducing Conjuctions and /ænd/ -/ən/ or /ɔ:r/-/ər/ as /æz/-/əz/ Reducing Prepositions to /tu:/-/tə/ for /fɔ:(r)/-/fə(r)/ of /ʌv//ɒv/-/əv//ə/ Reducing Auxiliary Verbs have /hæv/-/əv//ə/ has /hæz/-/əz//ə/ can /kæn/-/kən/ Reducing Pronous he /hi/-/i/ you /jʊ/-/yə/ her /hə(r)/-/ə(r)/ his /hɪz/-/ɪz/ him /hɪm/-/ɪm//əm/ Reducing Verb + to want to——wanna going to——gonna have to——hafta has to——hasta had to——hada ought to——oudda Here are some note: 五种类型的弱读 1.Reducing Conjunction 弱读连词 and /ænd/→/ən/ eg.apples and oranges you and me
